frames.caption: A joyful mother and child are surrounded by vibrant, colorful decorations. The child, wearing a floral headband, holds a pink egg while the mother holds a yellow one, both dressed in matching yellow outfits. The background is filled with bright, fluffy paper flowers in various colors.
frames.description: The scene depicts a cheerful and colorful celebration, possibly a festive or holiday event. The focus is on the mother and child, who are sharing a joyful moment together amidst a backdrop of vivid decorations.

frames.caption: A joyful mother and child share a tender moment amidst a vibrant backdrop of colorful flowers. The child, adorned with a floral crown, holds a pink egg while the mother holds a yellow one, both smiling warmly at each other. The scene is filled with bright colors and a sense of celebration.
frames.description: The scene captures a mother and child in a festive setting, surrounded by vivid, oversized paper flowers. The atmosphere is joyful and lively, suggesting a celebration or special occasion.

summary: People: mother, child. Objects: egg, floral headband, paper flowers, floral crown, pink egg. Actions: holding, smiling. Emotions: joy, happiness, warmth. Scenes: celebration, festive. Concepts: family, togetherness, colorful, motherhood, happiness
